translation: He who is of the same mind towards the good-hearted, friends, enemies, the indifferent, the neutral, the hateful, the relatives, the righteous, and the unrighteous, excels.
commentary: 6.9 Suhyanmitrariyudasinamadyasthadveshyabandhushu in the goodhearted? in friends? in enemies? in the indifferent? in neutrals? his haters and his relatives? among the saints in the righteous? Even also? f and? in sins in the unrighteous?,samabuddhih one who has eal mind? He excels.Commentary He excels He is the best among the Yogarudhas.Samabudhhi is eanimity or evenness of mind. A Yogi of Samabuddhi has eal
